original_text: I said to myself, ‘Listen! I have become very wise! I am much wiser than any of the kings who ruled in Jerusalem before me. I know a lot more things than they ever did!’ I said to myself, ‘Listen! I have become very wise! I am much wiser than any of the kings who ruled in Jerusalem before me. I know a lot more things than they ever did!’ I said to myself, ‘Listen! I have become very wise! I am much wiser than any of the kings who ruled in Jerusalem before me. I know a lot more things than they ever did!’ I said to myself, ‘Listen! I have become very wise! I am much wiser than any of the kings who ruled in Jerusalem before me. I know a lot more things than they ever did!’
korean_text: 내가 내 마음 속으로 말하여 이르기를 보라 내가 크게 되고 지혜를 더 많이 얻었으므로 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있던 모든 사람들보다 낫다 하였나니 내 마음이 지혜와 지식을 많이 만나 보았음이로다

sentences.original_text: I am much wiser than any of the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 어떤 왕들보다 훨씬 더 지혜롭다

sentences.original_text: who ruled in Jerusalem before me.
I know a lot more things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 훨씬 더 많은 것들을 안다
